property.name: insertStudent
property.value: INSERT INTO student (name, study_group, study_year) VALUES (:name, :studyGroup, :studyYear)

property.name: updateStudent
property.value: UPDATE student SET name = :name, study_group = :studyGroup, study_year = :studyYear WHERE `student_id` = :studentId

property.name: queryStudent
property.value: SELECT s.student_id, s.name, s.study_group group_student, e.exam_id, e.subject, e.date, e.study_group group_exam, g.grade FROM student s INNER JOIN exam_grade n ON s.student_id = g.student_id INNER JOIN exam e ON g.exam_id = e.exam_id WHERE g.grade < :grade OR g.grade IS NULL

property.name: insertExam
property.value: INSERT INTO exam (study_group, subject, professor_name, date, classroom) VALUES (:studyGroup, :subject, :professorName, :date, :classroom)

property.name: updateExam
property.value: UPDATE exam SET study_group = :studyGroup, subject = :subject, professor_name = :professorName, date = :date, classroom = :classroom WHERE exam_id = :examId

property.name: queryExamStatistics
property.value: SELECT e.*, COUNT(CASE WHEN g.grade IS NOT NULL THEN g.student_id END) students_attending, COUNT(CASE WHEN g.grade > :grade AND g.grade IS NOT NULL THEN g.student_id END) students_promoted, AVG(CASE WHEN g.grade IS NOT NULL THEN g.grade END) grade_average FROM exam e INNER JOIN exam_grade g ON e.exam_id = g.exam_id WHERE e.exam_id = :examId
